title: Getting Leaverbuster for no reason
body: i was playing with my friend in co-op mode after i finish the match get Leaver Buster (20 min ) For no reason can some one tell me why i get it :| ? i didn't leave any match and the last match was co-op and i didn't leave it .-. can you pleas unban me and fix this bug ?

replies.body: You'll only see a leaverbuster penalty if you've exhibited a trend of leaving or disconnecting from matches lately. Were there any technical issues either causing you to load into matches slow or disconnect in any way?
i didnt disconnect from any match recently i get this ban for no thing .-.
